DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study evaluate safety single infusion tocilizumab versus placebo , administer addition standard premedications ( antipyretic , antihistamine , corticosteroid ) prior first infusion obinutuzumab administer combination oral chlorambucil participant previously untreated B-CLL comorbidities . All eligible participant treat total 6 cycle obinutuzumab + chlorambucil ( cycle length = 28 day ) .
